title: Cheese Burger
info: Our standard classic with a thick slice of American Cheese!

title: Bacon Burger
info: Our classic Cheese Burger with crispy bacon added!

title: BBQ Bacon Burger
info: Our Bacon Burger smothered in BBQ sauce and grilled onions!

title: Chicken Burger
info: A classic standard Chicken burger. Comes standard with mayo and lettuce.

title: Spicy Chicken Burger
info: Our standard Chicken Burger seasoned with spices to give it a slight kick!

title: Fire Chicken Burger
info: Our hottest menu option for those that love a good sweat!

title: Steak Fries
info: Fries seasoned with our homestyle spices, but thicker for a heartier meal!

info: Classic tots with our homestyle seasoning!

info: The iconic standard of ice cream treats! Available in chocolate or vanilla!

title: Shakes
